page.title: 19Industry
page.content: There are only two factories in the area. Lakeland Plastics is an expanding company with a new factory on waste ground which used to be the old station sidings. Initially concentrating on polythene products, they now make a wide range of products used for wrappings and in the kitchen. Fell's Engineering at Troutbeck Bridge used to employ well over 100 people making parts for the engineering industry. The general recession in the last few years made redundancies necessary and now there are only about 30 employed.
